1707.TW.summary: Grape King Bio Ltd produces and sells pharmaceutical preparations, patent medicines, liquid tonics, drinks, and healthy foods in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distributors, and Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) segments. The company offers mushroom mycelium products, such as ganoderma lucidum, agaricus blazei, antrodia cinnamomea, cordyceps sinensis, and coriolus versicolor; probiotics, including enterococcus, bifidobacterium, lactobacillus, pediococcus, streptococcus, saccharomyces, and clostridium; and enzymes. It also provides OEM, original design manufacturing, formulation design, research and development, and raw material supply services. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

1731.TW.summary: Maywufa Company Ltd. manufactures and sells hair and skin care products under the Maywufa brand in Taiwan. It offers hair color creams; health care products and food supplements; and mother and baby skin care products under the mustela brand. The company also provides pharmaceuticals and medical devices, such as Lyophilized injection; AmCad-UT Detection device, an ultrasound CAD for thyroid cancer detection; and bio-three tablets for the treatment of mild diarrhea, abdominal pain, and constipation. In addition, it sells and distributes pharmaceutical products; and operates and manages pharmacy chain under the Pharmacy Franchise name. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

1789.TW.summary: ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, researches and develops, produces, and sells CGMP active pharmaceutical ingredients (API) to pharmaceutical companies in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, India, rest of Asia, and internationally. The company offers custom synthesis services for biochemistry molecules, such as peptides and nucleic acids; generic API manufacturing services; and outsourcing services. It also provides CRAM services, such as chemistry skill, analytical and regulatory, chemical process development, clinical drug substance, and consulting services for the development and manufacturing of clinical, small-scale, and commercial-stage APIs and intermediates. In addition, the company develops peptide synthesis technologies. Further, it develops and manufactures western medicines and other chemical materials, albumin medicines, oligonucleotide medicines, injections, and new small molecule drugs, as well as provides biological technology services and technical services. The company has a strategic alliance with Baxter International Inc. to develop, manufacture, and commercialize of antiemetic drug in chemotherapy for cancer. ScinoPharm Taiwan, Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

1795.TW.summary: Lotus Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells medicines in Taiwan, Korea, the United States, and internationally. Its product portfolio focuses on generics in the fields of oncology, cardiology, nephrology, and central nervous system disease. The company also sells and markets a portfolio of over-the-counter medicines. In addition, it engages in wholesale of cosmetics; retail of clinical machines; biotech technological services; and related consulting services. Lotus Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan. Lotus Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Alvogen Emerging Markets Holdings Limited.

3054.TW.summary: LIWANLI Innovation Co., Ltd. operates in the biomedical science industry. The company provides products in the areas of nutrition and healthcare. It offers Vigoway and powder collection products for male, female, elderly, and children audience. The company was formerly known as Carry Technology International Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LIWANLI Innovation Co., Ltd. in 2015. LIWANLI Innovation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3705.TW.summary: YungShin Global Holding Corporation, through its subsidiaries, produces and sells pharmaceutical products. The company offers medicines and feed additives for swine, ruminants, poultry, pets, and aquatics; APIs, API intermediates, and specialty chemicals, as well as CRO and CMO services; herbal products; health foods; and beauty care products. It also operates EYES testing laboratories for food safety testing; and offers western medicines, agricultural products, chemical intermediates, and over-the-counter medicines. In addition, the company imports and exports pharmaceuticals, APIs, bio-products, and functional food materials; exports medicine-manufacturing machines and components, and medicine/food ingredients, as well as related materials, such as ampoules and vials; imports tablet-analysis equipment; and operates a nursing home for senior care. It operates in Taiwan, China, the United States, Japan, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, Cambodia, and South Africa. YungShin Global Holding Corporation was founded in 1952 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4108.TW.summary: PhytoHealth Corporation engages in the development of botanical drugs in Asia. Its products include PG2 Lyophilized injection, an injectable drug for the treatment of cancer; EnerCharge, which is used in enhancing physical strength, maintaining good spirits, and enhancing health maintenance activities; NatoCleanse capsules, which helps to reduce the risk of cardiovascular diseases; ReyeasCleanse health food capsules; and EnerCharge, an energy drink. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. PhytoHealth Corporation is a subsidiary of Maywufa Company Ltd.

4746.TW.summary: Formosa Laboratories, Inc. produces and sells active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and UV-filters worldwide. Its API products include vitamin D derivatives, balsalazide, benzonatate, capsaicin, colesevelam, gadodiamide, flupentixol, melitracen, meprobamate, montelukast, mycophenolate mofetil, sevelamer, and taltirelin covering the areas of anticancers, anti-inflammatory and analgesic agents, MRI enhancing agents, polymeric drugs, CNS agents, immunomodulators, respiratory agents, steroids, vit. D derivatives, and antibiotics. The company also provides UV filters, such as avobenzone and octinoxate. In addition, it offers custom synthesis service ranging from process development to commercial production for APIs and other specialty chemicals; solutions for manufacturing antibody-drug conjugates; and injectable manufacturing services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
